00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_SUMEQ_H
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_SUMEQ_H
00022 
00023 //ONLY WORKS FOR VARS WHERE ARBITRARY VALUES CAN BE REMOVED AT ANY TIME
00024 
00025 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename VarRef3>
00026 struct SumEqConstraintDynamic : public AbstractConstraint
00027 {
00028   virtual string constraint_name()
00029   { return "SumEqDynamic"; }
00030   
00031   VarRef1 x;
00032   VarRef2 y;
00033   VarRef3 z;
00034   
00035   int xmult, ymult;
00036 
00037   SumEqConstraintDynamic(StateObj* _stateObj, int _xmult, int _ymult, VarRef1 _x, VarRef2 _y, VarRef3 _z) :
00038     AbstractConstraint(stateObj), xmult(_xmult), ymult(_ymult), x(_x), y(_y), z(_z), vals(-1)
00039   { 
00040 #ifndef WATCHEDLITERALS
00041     cerr << "This almost certainly isn't going to work... sorry" << endl;
00042 #endif
00043     if(xmult < 1 || ymult < 1)
00044       INPUT_ERROR("Multipliers on gacsum must be > 0")
00045   }
00046 
00047   int vals;
00048   
00049   int dynamic_trigger_count() //need two watched literals per value in each var (one per support) 
00050   {
00051     if(vals == -1) { //not already calculated 
00052       vals = 0;
00053       DomainInt max = x.getMax(); 
00054       for(DomainInt i = x.getMin(); i <= max; i++) 
00055         if(x.inDomain(i)) vals++; 
00056       max = y.getMax(); 
00057       for(DomainInt i = y.getMin(); i <= max; i++) 
00058         if(y.inDomain(i)) vals++; 
00059       max = z.getMax(); 
00060       for(DomainInt i = z.getMin(); i <= max; i++) 
00061         if(z.inDomain(i)) vals++; 
00062     } 
00063     //printf("Count: %d\n", vals);
00064     return 2 * vals; 
00065     //return 1000;
00066   }
00067   
00068   vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00069   {
00070     vector<AnyVarRef> a;
00071     a.reserve(3); a.push_back(x); a.push_back(y); a.push_back(z);
00072     return a;
00073   }
00074 
00075   BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size) {
00076     return xmult*v[0] + ymult*v[1] == v[2];
00077   }
00078 
00079   //use smart algorithm to find out if any a + b = c in linear time
00080   //puts supports for c in resArr and returns T, or F if none exist
00081   BOOL get_sumsupport(VarRef1& a, VarRef2& b, DomainInt c, int (&resArr)[2]) {
00082     DomainInt bMin = b.getMin();
00083     DomainInt bMax = b.getMax();
00084     DomainInt aCurr = max(a.getMin(), (c - bMax*ymult)/xmult);
00085     DomainInt aMax = min(a.getMax(), (c - bMin*ymult)/xmult);
00086 
00087     while(aCurr <= aMax && !a.inDomain(aCurr))
00088       aCurr++;
00089     while(aCurr <= aMax) {
00090       DomainInt required = c - aCurr*xmult;
00091       DomainInt reqB = required / ymult;
00092       DomainInt modB = required % ymult;
00093       if(modB == 0 && b.inDomain(reqB)) {
00094         resArr[0] = aCurr;
00095         resArr[1] = reqB;
00096         D_ASSERT(resArr[0]*xmult + resArr[1]*ymult == c);
00097         return 1;
00098       } else {
00099         aCurr++;
00100         while(aCurr <= aMax && !(a.inDomain(aCurr)))
00101           aCurr++;
00102       }
00103     }
00104     return 0; //no supports possible
00105   }
00106 
00107   //variation on get_sumsupport to do a - b*bmult = c
00108   template<typename VarType1>
00109   BOOL get_diffsupport(VarRef3& a, VarType1& b, int bmult, DomainInt c, int (&resArr)[2]) {
00110     DomainInt bMin = b.getMin();
00111     DomainInt bMax = b.getMax();
00112     DomainInt aCurr = max(a.getMin(), (c + bMin*bmult));
00113     DomainInt aMax = min(a.getMax(), (c + bMax*bmult));
00114     while(aCurr <= aMax && !a.inDomain(aCurr))
00115       aCurr++;
00116     while(aCurr <= aMax) {
00117       DomainInt required = aCurr - c;
00118       DomainInt reqB = required / bmult;
00119       DomainInt modB = required % bmult;
00120       if(modB == 0 && b.inDomain(reqB)) {
00121         resArr[0] = aCurr;
00122         resArr[1] = reqB;
00123         D_ASSERT(resArr[0] - resArr[1]*bmult == c);
00124         return 1;
00125       } else {
00126         aCurr++;
00127         while(aCurr <= aMax && !(a.inDomain(aCurr)))
00128           aCurr++;
00129       }
00130     }
00131     return 0; //no supports possible    
00132   }
00133 
00134   //a little data structure we maintain per WL
00135   struct WLdata {
00136     int other; //sequence number of the other WL helping to support the varval
00137     int isForX : 1; //the supported var
00138     int isForY : 1; //NB. the supported val is stored using dt->trigger_info()
00139     int isForZ : 1;
00140   };
00141 
00142   //a mapping from WL number to struct of data
00143   vector<WLdata> wlToData;
00144   
00145   // find a couple of supports for every single value, put watches on
00146   // these, also build data structures to allow mapping from WL number
00147   // to var/val as well as the other WL on this value
00148   virtual void full_propagate()
00149   {
00150 
00151     //start placing WLs in the right places
00152     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();  
00153 
00154     int index = 0;
00155     WLdata workingData;
00156     int supp[2] = {0, 0};
00157 
00158     wlToData.reserve(dynamic_trigger_count());
00159 
00160     //place a WL for each value
00161     //z first:
00162     int max = z.getMax();
00163     for(int i = z.getMin(); i <= max; i++) {
00164       if(z.inDomain(i)) {
00165     if(!get_sumsupport(x, y, i, supp)) {
00166       z.removeFromDomain(i);
00167     } else {
00168       x.addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, supp[0]);
00169       y.addDynamicTrigger(dt+1, DomainRemoval, supp[1]);
00170       dt->trigger_info() = i;     //keep a note of the value it supports
00171       (dt+1)->trigger_info() = i;
00172       workingData.other = index + 1;
00173       workingData.isForX = 0; workingData.isForY = 0; workingData.isForZ = 1;
00174       wlToData.push_back(workingData);
00175       workingData.other = index;
00176       wlToData.push_back(workingData);
00177       index += 2;
00178       dt += 2;
00179     }
00180       }
00181     }
00182     //supports for x:
00183     max = x.getMax();
00184     for(int i = x.getMin(); i <= max; i++) {
00185       if(x.inDomain(i)) {
00186     if(!get_diffsupport(z, y, ymult, i*xmult, supp)) {
00187       x.removeFromDomain(i);
00188     } else {
00189       z.addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, supp[0]);
00190       y.addDynamicTrigger(dt + 1, DomainRemoval, supp[1]);
00191       dt->trigger_info() = i;
00192       (dt+1)->trigger_info() = i;
00193       workingData.other = index + 1;
00194       workingData.isForX = 1; workingData.isForY = 0; workingData.isForZ = 0;
00195       wlToData.push_back(workingData);
00196       workingData.other = index;
00197       wlToData.push_back(workingData);
00198       index += 2;
00199       dt += 2;
00200     }
00201       }
00202     }
00203     //supports for y:
00204     max = y.getMax();
00205     for(int i = y.getMin(); i <= max; i++) {
00206       if(y.inDomain(i)) {
00207     if(!get_diffsupport(z, x, xmult, i*ymult, supp)) {
00208       y.removeFromDomain(i);
00209     } else {
00210       z.addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, supp[0]);
00211       x.addDynamicTrigger(dt + 1, DomainRemoval, supp[1]);
00212       dt->trigger_info() = i;
00213       (dt+1)->trigger_info() = i;
00214       workingData.other = index + 1;
00215       workingData.isForX = 0; workingData.isForY = 1; workingData.isForZ = 0;
00216       wlToData.push_back(workingData);
00217       workingData.other = index;
00218       wlToData.push_back(workingData);
00219       index += 2;
00220       dt += 2;
00221     }
00222       }
00223     }
00224   }
00225 
00226   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00227   {
00228     int value = dt->trigger_info(); //the value formerly supported by dt
00229     DynamicTrigger* dts = dynamic_trigger_start();
00230     int wl_no = dt - dts; //sequence number of WL
00231     WLdata data = wlToData[wl_no];
00232     if(!(data.isForX ? x.inDomain(value) :
00233      (data.isForY ? y.inDomain(value) : z.inDomain(value))))
00234       return;
00235     int supp[2] = {0, 0};
00236     DynamicTrigger* first_dt = (dt < dts + data.other) ? dt : dt - 1;
00237     if(data.isForX) {
00238       if(!get_diffsupport(z, y, ymult, value*xmult, supp)) {
00239     x.removeFromDomain(value);
00240       } else {
00241     z.addDynamicTrigger(first_dt, DomainRemoval, supp[0]);
00242     y.addDynamicTrigger(first_dt + 1, DomainRemoval, supp[1]);
00243       }
00244     } else if(data.isForY) {
00245       if(!get_diffsupport(z, x, xmult, value*ymult, supp)) {
00246     y.removeFromDomain(value);
00247       } else {
00248     z.addDynamicTrigger(first_dt, DomainRemoval, supp[0]);
00249     x.addDynamicTrigger(first_dt + 1, DomainRemoval, supp[1]);
00250       }
00251     } else {
00252       if(!get_sumsupport(x, y, value, supp)) {
00253     z.removeFromDomain(value);
00254       } else {
00255     x.addDynamicTrigger(first_dt, DomainRemoval, supp[0]);
00256     y.addDynamicTrigger(first_dt + 1, DomainRemoval, supp[1]);
00257       }
00258     }
00259   }
00260 };
00261 
00262 template<typename VarArray, typename Var>
00263 AbstractConstraint*
00264 BuildCT_GACSUM(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<int>& consts, const VarArray& _var_array, const Var& var, ConstraintBlob&)
00265 {
00266   typedef typename VarArray::value_type ValT;
00267   typedef typename Var::value_type VarT;
00268   
00269   if(consts.size() != 2 || _var_array.size() != 2)
00270     INPUT_ERROR("gacsum only accepts two variables on the left hand side.");
00271 
00272   return new SumEqConstraintDynamic<ValT,ValT,VarT>(stateObj, 
00273    consts[0], consts[1], _var_array[0], _var_array[1], var[0]);
00274 }
00275 
00276 #endif
